BonusDescriptions: WordsWords: This item lets you deploy an alternate drone from the UAV Specialist Slot Item.

Description.Details: The Canary is a 0.5 ton spotter UAV equipped with ECM, stealth armor and night vision. It has no weapons, not even a TAG, it maintains a low profile, observes and relies entirely on the skill of the operator to Sensor Lock enemies and feed information to C3 equipped allies. Hold Shift when selecting the Deploy ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
